panels.title: SnapMirror Data Protection Overview per Cluster

panels.description: Volumes Protected With Snapmirror (Local And Remote)
panels.title: Protected By Status

targets.expr: count(group by (source_volume) (1 < snapmirror_lag_time{datacenter="$Datacenter",cluster=~"$Cluster", source_volume!=""} * on (source_volume, source_vserver, cluster) group_left() label_replace( label_replace(volume_labels{datacenter="$Datacenter",cluster=~"$Cluster",volume!~"MDV.*",type="rw"}, "source_volume", "$1", "volume", "(.*)") , "source_vserver", "$1", "svm", "(.*)")  <= 900))

count(group by (source_volume) (900 < snapmirror_lag_time{datacenter="$Datacenter",cluster=~"$Cluster", source_volume!=""} * on (source_volume, source_vserver, cluster) group_left() label_replace( label_replace(volume_labels{datacenter="$Datacenter",cluster=~"$Cluster",volume!~"MDV.*",type="rw"}, "source_volume", "$1", "volume", "(.*)") , "source_vserver", "$1", "svm", "(.*)")  <= 1800))

count(group by (source_volume) (1800 < snapmirror_lag_time{datacenter="$Datacenter",cluster=~"$Cluster", source_volume!=""} * on (source_volume, source_vserver, cluster) group_left() label_replace( label_replace(volume_labels{datacenter="$Datacenter",cluster=~"$Cluster",volume!~"MDV.*",type="rw"}, "source_volume", "$1", "volume", "(.*)") , "source_vserver", "$1", "svm", "(.*)")  <= 3600))

count(group by (source_volume) (snapmirror_lag_time{datacenter="$Datacenter", cluster=~"$Cluster",source_volume!=""} * on (source_volume, source_vserver, cluster) group_left() label_replace( label_replace(volume_labels{datacenter="$Datacenter",cluster=~"$Cluster",volume!~"MDV.*",type="rw"}, "source_volume", "$1", "volume", "(.*)") , "source_vserver", "$1", "svm", "(.*)") > 3600))

count(group by (source_volume) (1 < snapmirror_lag_time{datacenter="$Datacenter",cluster=~"$Cluster", source_volume!=""} * on (source_volume, source_vserver, cluster) group_left() label_replace( label_replace(volume_labels{datacenter="$Datacenter",cluster=~"$Cluster",volume!~"MDV.*",type="rw"}, "source_volume", "$1", "volume", "(.*)") , "source_vserver", "$1", "svm", "(.*)")  <= 900))

count(group by (source_volume) (900 < snapmirror_lag_time{datacenter="$Datacenter",cluster=~"$Cluster", source_volume!=""} * on (source_volume, source_vserver, cluster) group_left() label_replace( label_replace(volume_labels{datacenter="$Datacenter",cluster=~"$Cluster",volume!~"MDV.*",type="rw"}, "source_volume", "$1", "volume", "(.*)") , "source_vserver", "$1", "svm", "(.*)")  <= 1800))

count(group by (source_volume) (1800 < snapmirror_lag_time{datacenter="$Datacenter",cluster=~"$Cluster", source_volume!=""} * on (source_volume, source_vserver, cluster) group_left() label_replace( label_replace(volume_labels{datacenter="$Datacenter",cluster=~"$Cluster",volume!~"MDV.*",type="rw"}, "source_volume", "$1", "volume", "(.*)") , "source_vserver", "$1", "svm", "(.*)")  <= 3600))

count(group by (source_volume) (snapmirror_lag_time{datacenter="$Datacenter", cluster=~"$Cluster",source_volume!=""} * on (source_volume, source_vserver, cluster) group_left() label_replace( label_replace(volume_labels{datacenter="$Datacenter",cluster=~"$Cluster",volume!~"MDV.*",type="rw"}, "source_volume", "$1", "volume", "(.*)") , "source_vserver", "$1", "svm", "(.*)") > 3600))

panels.title: SnapMirror Volumes (local and remote) Protected by

targets.expr: snapmirror_lag_time{datacenter="$Datacenter", cluster=~"$Cluster",source_volume!=""} * on (source_volume, source_vserver, cluster) group_left() label_replace( label_replace(volume_labels{datacenter="$Datacenter",cluster=~"$Cluster",volume!~"MDV.*",type="rw"}, "source_volume", "$1", "volume", "(.*)") , "source_vserver", "$1", "svm", "(.*)")

panels.title: SnapMirror Data Protection Analysis per Cluster

targets.expr: count(snapmirror_labels{datacenter="$Datacenter", cluster=~"$Cluster",volume!~"MDV.*", derived_relationship_type="extended_data_protection"} * on (source_volume, source_vserver, cluster) group_left() label_replace( label_replace(volume_labels{datacenter="$Datacenter", cluster=~"$Cluster",volume!~"MDV.*",type="rw"}, "source_volume", "$1", "volume", "(.*)") , "source_vserver", "$1", "svm", "(.*)") )
